title: Auto-scaling
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has the required auto-scaling configuration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_autoscale; const expected_result = `Auto-scaling: ${(typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_2_min_workers) || 8}-${(typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_2_max_workers) || 32} nodes (Â±0% tolerance)`; let actual_result = 'Auto-scaling: Not found'; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-104-2', title: 'Auto-scaling', expected_result, actual_result }; } const apiOutput = clusterStep.data; let minWorkers = null; let maxWorkers = null; if (apiOutput.autoscale && apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers !== undefined && apiOutput.autoscale.max_workers !== undefined) { minWorkers = apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers; maxWorkers = apiOutput.autoscale.max_workers; actual_result = `Auto-scaling: ${minWorkers}-${maxWorkers} nodes`; } if (minWorkers !== null && maxWorkers !== null) { const requiredMinWorkers = (typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_2_min_workers) || 8; const requiredMaxWorkers = (typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_2_max_workers) || 32; const minMatches = minWorkers === requiredMinWorkers; const maxMatches = maxWorkers === requiredMaxWorkers; if (minMatches && maxMatches) { return { status: 'pass', message: `At least one cluster has the required auto-scaling configuration (${requiredMinWorkers}-${requiredMaxWorkers} nodes)`, code: 'CORRECT_AUTO_SCALING', test_id: 'IQ-104-2', title: 'Auto-scaling', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: `Cluster auto-scaling configuration does not meet requirements: Min workers is ${minWorkers} instead of ${requiredMinWorkers}; Max workers is ${maxWorkers} instead of ${requiredMaxWorkers};`, code: 'INCORRECT_AUTO_SCALING', test_id: 'IQ-104-2', title: 'Auto-scaling', expected_result, actual_result }; } } return { status: 'fail', message: 'Auto-scaling configuration is missing or incomplete', code: 'MISSING_AUTOSCALE_INFO', test_id: 'IQ-104-2', title: 'Auto-scaling', expected_result, actual_result }; }
